Name: Assistance: Rare Pact
AttributesDescription:
Summons an Echo to support you in combat. It does not take damage from the Resonators.

This Token has unlimited uses in Whimpering Wastes.
BgDescription: A strange pact and its accompanying Echo, offered by an unnamed lady. It recreates fragments of the Sentinel's divine miracles in a mysterious way.
ObtainedShowDescription: Summons an Echo to support you in combat. It does not take damage from the Resonators.
